item.title: Peer raises $10.5M for metaverse engine, launches 3D personal planets
item.description: Peer announced today it's raised new funding to build its AI-powered metaverse engine and launched its "personal planets" feature.

item.title: A standard, open framework for building AI agents is coming from Cisco, LangChain and Galileo
item.description: The collective, called AGNTCY, aims to create a standard way for AI agents from different platforms and frameworks to talk to each other.

item.title: Hugging Face co-founder Thomas Wolf just challenged Anthropic CEO’s vision for AI’s future — and the $130 billion industry is taking notice
item.description: Hugging Face co-founder Thomas Wolf challenges Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei's "compressed 21st century" vision, arguing AI systems are building "yes-men...

item.title: Welevel raises $5.7M to revolutionize procedural game development
item.description: Indie game development studio Welevel today announced that it raised $5.7 million in funding to transform procedural game development.

item.title: Alibaba’s new open source model QwQ-32B matches DeepSeek-R1 with way smaller compute requirements
item.description: While DeepSeek-R1 operates with 671 billion parameters, QwQ-32B achieves comparable performance with a much smaller footprint.
